entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix Entry "Next" search performance #13147
    8.0-preview2
  • App crash when initialize a delegate class from native library binding #13142
  • Disable Blazor Hybrid Mac Catalyst context menu #13139
    Backlog
  • Isbusy="True" in ContentPage crashes the app #13138
  • CornerRadius works incorrectly due to wrong parameter order #13136
    Backlog
  • Navigating using flyout menu causes all items after first item in TabBar to dissapear. #13134
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] - Momentary freeze on adding child while maximizing the application. #13133
    Backlog
  • Android crash - Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR) #13131
  • Label placed in a specially-made layout randomly wants to wrap even when there is enough space #13130
    Backlog
  • DisplayPromptAsync auto-capitalizes some letters #13129
    Backlog
  • Frame bottom border disappears if its content's margin is 0 (Only on Windows) #13128
    Backlog
  • Rectangle layout issue in a Grid #13126
    Backlog
  • Entry keyboard:Numeric does not block text in Windows platform #13125

Closed

  • [iOS] Editor Placeholder misaligned vertically #585
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .NET MAUI Blazor App - UI Freeze when overwhelmed with key and mouse input messages #13145
  • ControlTemplate not propagating the BindingContext correctly #12470
    Backlog
  • [Android] Modal Page doesn't resize after keyboard disappears in entry field #12637
    Backlog
  • Modal Page does not cover whole screen on WSA (MAUI) #12647
    Backlog
  • Maui Keyboard Bugs both with AdjustPan/AdjustResize #12406
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Setting SetSoftInputMode to AdjustResize on Android breaks modal layouts (and probably more) #11286
    Backlog
  • [Android] Content wrapped in NavigationPage objects in Tabbed Page disappears after tabs navigating #9743
    Backlog
  • Fix MultiPageFragmentStateAdapter so it doesn't use `GetHashCode` for `GetItemId` #11529
    Backlog
  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: Can not perform this action after onSaveInstanceState #11259
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Entry field Enter does not always move to next field #11702
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Using System.Reactive Increases Package Size #5888
    Backlog
  • Published Android App crashes due to XAML incompatibility #13124
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Frame is cutted at the bottom on Windows #7154
    Backlog
  • ScrollView as child layout not working scrolling #7271
  • Failed to download the Developer Disk image for iOS 16.1 #13135
  • BoolToObjectConverter doesn't work with IconTintColorBehavior In Android #13122
  • Requesting Bluetooth permissions on Android 12+ at runtime #12264
    Backlog
  • Label fails to display html text when populated via binding #13015
    Backlog
  • CarouselView crashes on iOS when outer view IsVisible is set to false #13031
    Backlog
  • Maui.Graphics.Platform.PlatformGraphicsView Token Type Not Resolved #11413
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Android] 1. ToPlatformException: CollectionViewHandler incompatible 2. Button width incorrect。 #8039
    Backlog
  • WebAuthenticator doesn't support Azure App Service callback response. #11641
    Backlog
  • Wrong XAML error messages using Hot Reload #13050
  • Hot Reload Performance #13051
  • Hot Reload does not work or stops working in some specific cases #13052
  • Weird files in VS4Mac solution explorer #13060
  • MAUI Blazor Publish is taking a very long time #12948

PullRequests

Created

  • [listview] fixes for various null/empty DataTemplate #13146
    area/ListView
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview1] update to xamarin/xamarin-android/release/8.0.1xx-preview1@4530fc2 #13144
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [All platforms] Notify changes in CollectionView Layouts #13137
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Fix Shell FlyoutBackground #13132
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢

Merged

  • [iOS] Use same font size for Editor/Entry placeholders #13140
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Update GitInfo.txt fo net8 release p1 #13148
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Correctly propagate BindingContext in all ContentView scenarios #12536
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Fix initial page and back button Navigation events #12348
    area/navigation 🧭
  • Fix Modal page offset measuring for AdjustPan and AdjustResize #12661
    area/modal
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Remove PhoneDialer.Current #13079
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Essentials] add Bluetooth permissions #12413
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Html text rendering issue #13078
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [iOS] Fix crash with a hidden CarouselView #13083
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

Updated

  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    area/modal
  • Correctly handle ContainerView changes #13114
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Fix crash using complex html content #11409
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Proposal] Organize partial classes inside Controls #13113
    area/architecture
  • Feat: Added "Keyboard.None" #11024
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
